meanings.definition: Constituting number sixty in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The cake was decorated with a sixtieth birthday candle.
meanings.sent2: She celebrated her sixtieth birthday with a big party.
meanings.sent3: The sixtieth balloon popped right before the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The sixtieth star in the sky shone the brightest.
meanings.sent5: The sixtieth row of seats was reserved for special guests.

meanings.sent1: He ate a sixtieth of the pizza all by himself.
meanings.sent2: The sixtieth of the pie was saved for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added a sixtieth cup of sugar to the recipe.
meanings.sent4: She found the sixtieth piece of the puzzle hidden under the table.
meanings.sent5: The sixtieth slice of cake was the smallest but the tastiest.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number of sixty in counting order.
meanings.sent1: She finished the race in the sixtieth position.
meanings.sent2: The sixtieth in line got the last ticket to the show.
meanings.sent3: The sixtieth student in the class won a special prize.
meanings.sent4: He arrived at the party fashionably late, as the sixtieth guest.
meanings.sent5: The sixtieth page of the book held the most exciting twist.
